snippet: Formally confirming what has long been known in Hollywood, Fox said that Stacey Snider was joining it after a bumpy tenure as chief executive of DreamWorks Studios.
abstract: 20th Century Fox announces Stacey Snider is joining company as co-chairwoman after her bumpy tenure as chief executive of DreamWorks Studios.
lead_paragraph: Formally confirming what has long been known in Hollywood, Fox said that Stacey Snider was joining it after a bumpy tenure as chief executive of DreamWorks Studios.

headline.main: Stacey Snider Named Co-Chairwoman of 20th Century Fox
headline.print_headline: Co-Chairwoman Is Announced at Fox Film Unit
